scripts.build:sdk: pnpm --filter @castquest/sdk lint && pnpm --filter @castquest/sdk typecheck && pnpm --filter @castquest/sdk test && pnpm --filter @castquest/sdk build
scripts.build:web: pnpm --filter @castquest/web lint && pnpm --filter @castquest/web typecheck && pnpm --filter @castquest/web build
scripts.build:infra: pnpm run validate:docker && pnpm run validate:k8s
scripts.validate:docker: docker compose -f infra/docker-compose.yml config > /dev/null && echo 'Docker compose valid'
scripts.validate:terraform: cd infra/terraform && terraform fmt -check && terraform validate
